items.title: Final stage of Vuelta abandoned because of protests
items.summary: The final stage of the Vuelta a Espana is abandoned after pro-Palestinian protesters enter the course in the centre of Madrid.

items.title: Kerr makes triumphant return in Chelsea win over Aston Villa
items.summary: Sam Kerr comes off the bench to score in her first appearance in 20 months as Chelsea hold off Aston Villa to claim a 3-1 victory in the Women's Super League.

items.title: Albums That Have Spent the Most Weeks at No. 2 Without Reaching No. 1: FullÂ List
items.summary: By hitting No. 1 this week, KPop Demon Hunters drops off our list of albums that spent seven or more weeks in the runner-up spot without going all the way. Who remains?
items.body: UPDATE (Sept. 14): The KPop Demon Hunters soundtrack finally jumps to No. 1 on this weekâ€™s Billboard 200, after spending seven nonconsecutive weeks at No. 2. It ranked second behind Morgan Wallen â€™s Iâ€™m the Problem for five weeks, behind Stray Kids ‘ debuting Karma for one and behind Sabrina Carpenter ‘s debuting Man’s Best Friend for one. By hitting No. 1, we can remove KPop Demon Hunters from our list of albums that spent seven or more weeks in the runner-up spot without going all the way. We did include a parenthetical disclaimer that this could happen: â€œ(Of course, itâ€™s possible that  KPop  will make it to No. 1 eventually. No one would bet against the pop-culture juggernaut at this point.)â€ The list, which covers the entire history of the Billboard 200, from March 1956 to the present, is still valid — just one entry shorter. If you missed it last week, you have another chance to read it this week. PREVIOUSLY (Sept. 8): The artists with albums that logged seven or more weeks at No. 2 without reaching No. 1 are a varied bunch, running the gamut from mellow instrumentalist Kenny G to English glam metal band Whitesnake . Our list includes debut aâ€¦

items.title: Red Roses master conditions and sidestep Scots to set up France semi-final
items.summary: On a wet and windy day in Bristol, England played the percentages against Scotland and earned their reward - a spot in the Rugby World Cup semi-finals.

items.title: Travis Kelce Talks Taylor Swift Engagement Ahead of Chiefs-Eagles Showdown: â€˜Palms Were DefinitelyÂ Sweatingâ€™
items.summary: The NFL star sat down with sportscaster Erin Andrews ahead of the Super Bowl rematch on Sept. 14.
items.body: Travis Kelce is sharing a few more details about his engagement to Taylor Swift . In a pre-game interview ahead of the Kansas City Chiefs vs. Philadelphia Eagles matchup on Sunday (Sept. 14), the NFL star sat down with NFL on FOX to open up about the moment he popped the big question to the pop superstar. Related Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce Are Engaged: See the Announcement Travis Kelce Jokes About the Biggest Change in His Life Since Taylor Swift Engagement: ‘I Got One More Ring For It’ Travis Kelce Talks Proposing to Taylor Swift for the ‘Right Reasons,’ Says Calling Her His ‘FiancÃ©e’ Makes Him ‘Giddy’ â€œThe palms were definitely sweating,” the Chiefs tight end told sportscaster Erin Andrews in a clip shared on Instagram . “I’m an emotional guy, so there were a few tears here and there. Itâ€™s been an exciting ride up to this day, and I canâ€™t wait to spend the rest of my life with her.” While Kelce kept most of the details private, he added that heâ€™d let Swift â€œtell that story.â€ The highly anticipated game at Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri, marks a Super Bowl LIX rematch between the Châ€¦

items.title: 'Better than Treble year' - when could Haaland beat Shearer's record?
items.summary: The sight of a rampant Erling Haaland with a beaming smile on his face will be of great comfort to both Manchester City and boss Pep Guardiola after a "complete performance" against Manchester United.

items.title: â€˜KPop Demon Huntersâ€™ Soundtrack Hits No. 1 on the BillboardÂ 200
items.summary: Plus: Justin Bieberâ€™s SWAG surges to the top five after its deluxe reissue and sombrâ€™s I Barely Know Her hits the top 10.
items.body: The soundtrack to Netflixâ€™s animated film KPop Demon Hunters hits No. 1 on the Billboard 200 albums chart for the first time, rising 2-1 on the chart dated Sept. 20, after seven nonconsecutive weeks in the runner-up slot. The set earned 128,000 equivalent album units in the United States in the week ending Sept. 11 (up 7%), according to Luminate, marking the albumâ€™s best week yet. The surge to No. 1 follows the albumâ€™s deluxe reissue on Sept. 5 with additional tracks, plus the wide release of its CD that day. KPop Demon Hunters â€™ rise to No. 1 on the Billboard 200 was preceded by four top 10-charted hits on the Billboard Hot 100 songs chart â€” the most from a soundtrack in nearly 30 years, with the soundtrack the first ever with four simultaneous top 10s . Among those is the No. 1 â€œGoldenâ€ by HUNTR/X â€” the trio of EJAE, Audrey Nuna and REI AMI (the singing voices of the filmâ€™s characters Rumi, Mira and Zoey). Related ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack: All 12 Tracks Ranked Albums That Have Spent the Most Weeks at No. 2 Without Reaching No. 1: Full List ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Slay the Competition as ‘Golden’ Hits 6th Week as No. 1 Single in tâ€¦

items.title: Haaland scores twice as Man City cruise to win against Man Utd
items.summary: Manchester City beat rivals Manchester United 3-0, with a goal from Phil Foden followed by two from Erling Haaland at Etihad Stadium.

items.title: Salah scores dramatic late penalty to beat Burnley
items.summary: Liverpool remain unbeaten as they win 1-0 against Burnley after Mohamed Salah's stoppage time penalty at Turf Moor.

items.title: Man Utd need to work on a lot of things - Amorim
items.summary: Ruben Amorim believes his Manchester United side have a lot of work to do after their 3-0 loss to local rivals Manchester City.

items.title: Amorim needs to 'relax' his tactical approach - Walcott
items.summary: Theo Walcott tells Nahyan Chowdhury that Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim nneds to "relax" and be less "intense" in his tactical approach, after Manchester United's 3-0 loss to Manchester City.

items.title: Morgan Wallen Offers Prayers to Charlie Kirkâ€™s Widow Erika at Canadian TourÂ Stop
items.summary: "This song right here has been hitting me harder in the last couple days," the country singer said at his Edmonton show.
items.body: Morgan Wallen took a heartfelt moment during his recent concert in Canada to honor Erika Kirk, the grieving widow of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Performing at Edmontonâ€™s Commonwealth Stadium on Friday (Sept. 12), the 32-year-old country superstar paused midway through the show to share an emotional message. Just days earlier, Erikaâ€™s husband had been assassinated during a public speaking event in Utah. Related Jason Aldean, Kane Brown and Other Artists Speak Out on Charlie Kirk Killing & Colorado School Shooting Ariana Grande Addresses Ticket Resellers: 'It's Not Right' Selena Gomez Says This Movie Will Be Required Viewing for Her Kids “Iâ€™m not gonna say a whole bunch on this, but this song right here has been hitting me harder in the last couple days,â€ Wallen said in fan-captured footage . “I just wanted to let Erika Kirk know that me and my family are sending prayers her way.” Wallen then dedicated his song â€œIâ€™m a Little Crazyâ€ â€” which reached No. 17 on the Billboard Hot chart in April 2025 â€” to the Kirk family, inviting the crowd to join in and sing along. Charlie Kirk, 31, was a popular conservative activist and the co-founder â€¦

items.title: AI transfers and irate fans - 113 days of chaos at Sheffield United

items.title: England beat Scotland to set up semi-final clash with France

items.title: Zach Bryan and Gavin Adcock Nearly Come to Blows at Country Music Festival After OnlineÂ Beef
items.summary: Video footage of the argument shows Bryan attempting to jump a fence to confront Adcock.
items.body: Zach Bryan and Gavin Adcock were involved in a heated confrontation that nearly turned physical at the Born & Raised Festival in Pryor, Oklahoma. On Saturday (Sept. 13), the two country artists were caught on camera in a verbal altercation just moments before Adcock, 26, was scheduled to perform at the event. Related Gavin Adcock Tweaks Zach Bryan Over Viral Autograph Incident, Not Sure If Singer Is ‘That Great of a Person’ Zach Bryan Releases 3 New Songs ‘That Didnâ€™t Belong on the Record’ Gavin Adcock on the Secrets to His Sold-Out, Raucous Shows & Platinum Hits: â€˜The Fans Are Never Going to Wonder Where We Wentâ€™ A video clip, shared on Instagram by Adcock, shows the singers arguing from opposite sides of a chain-link fence. â€œHey, do you want to fight like a man? Come open the gate,â€ Bryan, 29, is heard saying before angrily shoving the fence. â€œWhen you get death threats from Sack Cryin before you headline in his hometown,â€ Adcock wrote over the short clip, using a mocking nickname for Bryan. He captioned the post, “Eat a snickers bro.” In another video posted to Facebook , Bryan is seen climbing over the barbed-wire-toppâ€¦

items.title: Ariana Grande Addresses Ticket Resellers: â€˜Itâ€™s NotÂ Rightâ€™
items.summary: Tickets for the pop star's tour dates in North America are currently only available at a premium on the resale market.
items.body: Ariana Grande has released a statement to fans regarding concert ticket resellers after the North American dates of her 2026 Eternal Sunshine Tour went on sale, and quickly sold out, earlier this week on Ticketmaster. Though face value tickets are not currently available, ticket inventory can be found at inflated prices on the resale market– on Ticketmaster and on platforms including StubHub, TickPick, SeatGeek and more. The singer posted an Instagram Story addressing the situation on Saturday (Sept. 13). “hi my angels, i have been on set all week but i wanted to let you know that whatâ€™s been happening with the secondary ticket resellers has been brought to my attention and of course i am incredibly bothered by it,” Grande wrote in her message. She continued, “iâ€™ve been on the phone every second of my free time fighting for a solution. i hear you and hopefully, we will be able to get more of these tickets into your hands instead of theirs. itâ€™s not right.” “i just wanted you to know that my team and i see it and that i care very much and we will do, and are doing, everything we can. i love you so much and thank you for your patience and understaâ€¦

items.title: Selena Gomez Says This Movie Will Be Required Viewing for HerÂ Kids
items.summary: "I completely sobbed," she said of watching the film, which she saw with her tween sister.
items.body: As her wedding date with Benny Blanco nears, Selena Gomez mentioned her future children in an appearance on Amy Poehler’s podcast. Chatting on this week’s episode of Good Hang With Amy Poehler , Gomez named the movie she plans to make her kids watch someday. Gomez congratulated the comedian on her work portraying Joy in Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out and Inside Out 2 , sharing that the animated movie franchise’s sequel — which introduces Anxiety (the character and emotion) into 13-year-old protagonist Riley’s life — had her in tears. In fact, the singer/actress/businesswoman thinks Inside Out 2 should be required viewing for all kids — including her own. “I watched it with my sister and I completely sobbed because it’s so factual … I almost feel like it should have been a requirement in school to watch that as a homework assignment,” Gomez said on the podcast’s Sept. 9 episode. She added that Gracie, her 12-year-old sister, also cried. (Watch the full episode below.) “Thereâ€™s that kind of heartbreak that happens when Anxiety moves in,â€ Poehler agreed. â€œNo matter the age, youâ€™re either feeling it in â€¦

items.title: Sharon Osbourne Breaks Silence Following Ozzy Osbourneâ€™s Death: â€˜Still Having Trouble Finding theÂ Wordsâ€™
items.summary: The iconic rocker's wife and manager shared a heartfelt post almost two months after his death.
items.body: Sharon Osbourne is “still having trouble finding the words” after Ozzy Osbourne â€™s death earlier this summer. On Friday (Sept. 12), the 72-year-old wife and longtime manager of the Black Sabbath frontman â€” who passed away on July 22 at age 76 â€” spoke out on social media for the first time since his passing, opening up about her grief and the outpouring of support she has received. Related Kelly Osbourne Honors Dad Ozzy Osbourne With NSFW Post Days After His Funeral ‘The Essential Ozzy Osbourne’ Vaults Up Billboard 200, Becoming His 10th Top 10 Ozzy Osbourne’s First Posthumous TV Appearance Will Melt Your Heart “Iâ€™m still having trouble finding the words to express how grateful I am for the overwhelming love and support youâ€™ve shown on social media,” the British TV personality wrote alongside an Instagram video featuring herself and daughter Kelly at a falconry in England. “Your comments, posts, and tributes have brought me more comfort than you know,” she continued. “None of it has gone unnoticed, in fact, itâ€™s carried me through many nights. Though Iâ€™m still finding my footing, I wanted to share some gloriâ€¦

items.title: â€˜Â¡Viva MÃ©xico!â€™ Oasis Thrills as Band Launches Latin American Leg of ReunionÂ Tour
items.summary: The Gallagher brothers performed the first of two sold-out shows at Mexico City's GNP Seguros Stadium on Sept. 12.
items.body: Brothers Liam and Noel Gallagher returned to Mexico after 17 years on Friday (Sept. 12), and the long wait to see Oasis live again was worth every moment â€” with the differences that led to their 2009 breakup being replaced by a celebration of pure, unfiltered rock and roll. The British bandâ€™s inaugural stop in Latin America on their highly successful Oasis Live â€™25 reunion tour â€” which launched in Cardiff, Wales, on July 4 â€” drew a crowd of 65,000 fans at Mexico Cityâ€™s Estadio GNP Seguros, according to promoter OCESA. It was the first of two sold-out nights at the iconic venue, which witnessed a majestic two-hour performance featuring songs that have become generational anthems globally. Related Oasis Say Hello, Goodbye to America: 5 Best Moments From Reunion Tourâ€™s U.S. Finale at the Rose Bowl Oasis Live ’25 Reunion Tour Setlist in Cardiff, Wales: Every Song From the First Show Oasis Celebrate Reunion Tour Kick-Off With Massive ‘Complete Studio Album Collection’ Box Set â€œÂ¡Viva MÃ©xico!â€, shouted frontman Liam Gallagher visibly moved, as he walked onto the stage hand in hand with his brother Noel. “Itâ€™s good to be back!” The massive screâ€¦

items.title: Foo Fighters Announce First Live Show With New Drummer Ilan Rubin, Tease Riff-Heavy NewÂ Song
items.summary: The former Nine Inch Nails drummer joined the band earlier this summer.
items.body: The Foo Fighters are gearing up for their first live performance with new drummer Ilan Rubin. The Dave Grohl -led rockers made a surprise announcement on Friday night (Sept. 12), revealing that theyâ€™re playing an all-ages show at the Fremont Theater in San Luis Obispo, California, on Saturday (Sept. 13). Related In Lead-Up To Overseas Dates, ‘Foo Fighters Assemble’ in Pics Before First Shows With New Drummer Foo Fighters Bring on Nine Inch Nails Drummer IIan Rubin Ahead of Asia Tour Foo Fighters Celebrate 30th Anniversary of Debut Album With Emotional New Track ‘Today’s Song’ The intimate gig at the 900-capacity venue will mark the bandâ€™s first official performance with Rubin, the former Nine Inch Nails drummer who joined the Foos earlier this summer. â€œSOUND ON. See you Saturday in San Luis Obispo,â€ the Foo Fighters wrote on Instagram alongside a show poster. Fans also quickly noticed a teaser of what seems to be a newly recorded track â€” and judging by the reaction, theyâ€™re fully on board with the riff-heavy sound. â€œYeeees this is the sound we like â€¦ Good heavy riffs! The boys are back to what theyâ€™re good at and it feels good!!â€ one fan comâ€¦

items.title: 'People looked at me like I was a something, not someone'
items.summary: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.

items.title: 'He fixes what needs fixing' - why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach
items.summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

items.title: 'He has made young players dream' - the making of Liverpool icon Salah
items.summary: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.

items.title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US

items.title: How Hampton overcame odds to become England's number one
items.summary: Hannah Hampton on overcoming a serious eye condition to rise to become England's number one goalkeeper at Euro 2025.
